item.title: revIgniter v2.1.6 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.1.6 has been released. Controllers can now be run via the command-line interface. To get more informations please read the Change Log of the User Guide.

item.title: revIgniter v2.1.5 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.1.5 has been released. This release adds CSP (Content Security Policy) support to AJAX pagination, to the Galleria helper and to the Asset helper.

item.title: revIgniter v2.1.4 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.1.4 has been released. This maintenance release implements the "SameSite" cookie attribute.

item.title: TM bundles v2.4.0 Released
item.description: This release adds dark themes "revIgniterDark" and "LiveCodeDark". Please read README.md included in the bundle.

item.title: revIgniter v2.1.3 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.1.3 has been released. This release fixes a bug in the authentication library which prevented the registration of new users.

item.title: revIgniter v2.1.2 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.1.2 has been released. This housekeeping release includes some minor changes e.g. database inserts and updates no longer set table fields to empty if the corresponding array element passed to the active record library is empty.

item.title: revIgniter v2.1.1 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.1.1 has been released. This maintenance release includes an extra variant to retrieve URI strings.

item.title: TM bundles v2.3.0 Released
item.description: This release adds tab triggers for the new handlers related to two-factor authentication. Please read README.

item.title: revIgniter v2.1.0 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.1.0 has been released. This release adds two-factor authentication and a one-time password (OTP) helper conforming to RFC6238.

item.title: revIgniter v2.0.5 Released
item.description: revIgniter v2.0.5 has been released. This release improves the Config library and fixes an issue with sub libraries.
